title: Present Perfect
description: Connect past actions with the present using 'have/has + past participle'.

title: Present Perfect Continuous
description: Talk about actions that started in the past and are still happening.

title: Past Continuous
description: Describe ongoing actions in the past that were interrupted.

title: First Conditional
description: Talk about real future possibilities: If it rains, I will stay home.

title: Used to
description: Talk about past habits or states that are no longer true.

title: Gerunds and Infinitives
description: Understand when to use verbs ending in -ing or to + verb after certain expressions.

title: Modal Verbs
description: Express ability, possibility, advice and obligation: must, might, should, etc.

title: Second Conditional
description: Talk about hypothetical situations in the present or future.

title: Relative Pronouns
description: Use who, which, where, whose, that to join sentences and add information.

title: Future Continuous
description: Describe actions that will be in progress at a future moment.
